name: Ho-Oh EX
author: Ryo Ueda

abilities.name: Purifying Fire
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon has any basic {R} attached to it, you may heal 50 damage from it.

attacks.name: Elemental Feather
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon).

rule_box: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
